sourcesContent:
import { cofounders } from '../data/co-founders'
import { Grid, Card, CardMedia, CardContent, Typography, Box } from '@mui/material'

const AboutUs = () => (
  <Box id="about" sx={{ py: 8, px: 4 }}>
    <Typography variant="h4" textAlign="center" mb={4} color="#17313E">
      About Us
    </Typography>
    <Typography variant="body1" maxWidth="md" sx={{ margin: '0 auto', textAlign: 'center', color: '#415E72' }}>
      We are a youth association based in Greece helping young people discover Erasmus+ programs for education, travel, and community building across Europe.
    </Typography>

    <Grid container spacing={4} mt={4} justifyContent="center">
      {cofounders.map((person) => (
        <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4} key={person.name}>
          <Card sx={{ backgroundColor: '#FFFFFF' }}>
            <CardMedia component="img" height="200" image={person.image} alt={person.name} />
            <CardContent>
              <Typography variant="h6">{person.name}</Typography>
              <Typography variant="subtitle2" color="text.secondary">{person.role}</Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" mt={1}>{person.bio}</Typography>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Grid>
      ))}
    </Grid>
  </Box>
)

export default AboutUs
